trans-unit.source: Basic Queries (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Consultas básicas (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Basic Queries (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Consultas básicas (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: This section provides examples of basic [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] queries.
trans-unit.target: En esta sección se ofrecen ejemplos de consultas básicas de [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: En esta sección

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Tema

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find an Element with a Specific Attribute (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-an-element-with-a-specific-attribute.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: buscar un elemento con un atributo específico (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-an-element-with-a-specific-attribute.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to find a particular element that has an attribute that has a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo encontrar un elemento en particular que tenga un atributo con un valor específico.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find an Element with a Specific Child Element (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-an-element-with-a-specific-child-element.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: buscar un elemento con un elemento secundario específico (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-an-element-with-a-specific-child-element.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to find a particular element that has a child element that has a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo encontrar un elemento en particular que tenga un elemento secundario con un valor específico.

trans-unit.source: [Querying an XDocument vs. Querying an XElement (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/querying-an-xdocument-vs-querying-an-xelement.md)
trans-unit.target: [Diferencias entre realizar consultas de un XDocument Un XElement (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/querying-an-xdocument-vs-querying-an-xelement.md)

trans-unit.source: Explains the differences between writing queries on an XML tree that is rooted in <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> and writing queries on an XML tree that is rooted in <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Explica las diferencias entre escribir consultas sobre un árbol XML cuya raíz comienza en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>y escribir consultas sobre un árbol XML que se basa en <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Descendants with a Specific Element Name (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-descendants-with-a-specific-element-name.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: buscar descendientes con un nombre de elemento específico (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-descendants-with-a-specific-element-name.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to find all the descendants of an element that have a specific name.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo encontrar todos los descendientes de un elemento que tengan un nombre en particular.

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A> axis.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo se utiliza la <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A>eje.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find a Single Descendant Using the Descendants Method (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-single-descendant-using-the-descendants-method.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: buscar un descendiente único mediante el método Descendants (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-single-descendant-using-the-descendants-method.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A> axis method to find a single uniquely named element.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A>elemento cuyo nombre de método de eje para encontrar un único de forma única.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Descendants%2A>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Write Queries with Complex Filtering (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-write-queries-with-complex-filtering.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: escribir consultas con filtrado complejo (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-write-queries-with-complex-filtering.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to write a query with a more complex filter.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo escribir una consulta que utilice un filtro más complejo.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Filter on an Optional Element (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-filter-on-an-optional-element.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: filtrar por un elemento opcional (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-filter-on-an-optional-element.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to find nodes in an irregularly shaped tree.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo encontrar nodos en un árbol con forma irregular.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find All Nodes in a Namespace (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-all-nodes-in-a-namespace.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: buscar todos los nodos en un Namespace (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-all-nodes-in-a-namespace.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to find all nodes that are in a specific namespace.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo encontrar todos los nodos que se encuentren en un espacio de nombres en particular.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Sort Elements (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-sort-elements.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: Ordenar elementos (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-sort-elements.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to write a query that sorts its results.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo escribir una consulta que ordene sus resultados.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Sort Elements on Multiple Keys (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-sort-elements-on-multiple-keys.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: Ordenar elementos en varias claves (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-sort-elements-on-multiple-keys.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to sort on multiple keys.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo ordenar por varias claves.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Calculate Intermediate Values (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-calculate-intermediate-values.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: calcular valores intermedios (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-calculate-intermediate-values.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use the `Let` clause to calculate intermediate values in a [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo utilizar el `Let` cláusula para calcular valores intermedios en un [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] consulta.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Write a Query that Finds Elements Based on Context (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-write-a-query-that-finds-elements-based-on-context.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: escribir una consulta que busca elementos basándose en el contexto (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-write-a-query-that-finds-elements-based-on-context.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to select elements based on other elements in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo seleccionar elementos en base a otros elementos del árbol.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Debug Empty Query Results Sets (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-debug-empty-query-results-sets.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: Depurar conjuntos de resultados de consulta vacía (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-debug-empty-query-results-sets.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows the appropriate fix when debugging queries on XML that is in a default namespace.
trans-unit.target: Muestra la solución apropiada cuando se depuran consultas sobre un XML que se encuentra en un espacio de nombres predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Vea también

trans-unit.target: [Consultar árboles XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/querying-xml-trees.md)
